Summon Commander:#1360 Onaqui

Beast Bats

spell id [id]: 67

Summon Units:#1357 Beast Bat x 8
The priest ventures into the depths of the Mictlan forests and makes a pact with an Onaqui. The Onaqui is a beast, half-man and half-animal, which feeds on human hearts. Onaqui are powerful Blood mages and dark sorcerers. They are accompanied by a swarm of Beast Bats that grows in the Dominion of the Dark Lord.
